mil7.7.4:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil7.7.4:0.2_0: The account of the fault-finding mind
mil7.7.4:1.1_0: “After going to the elephant should not engage in the five factors. What are the five things that should be cultivated?”
mil7.7.4:1.2_0: “Great king, the filthy concealing a filthy forest.
mil7.7.4:1.3_0: In the same way, a cow with a needle case, he shouldn’t get it even if it has been sent away to others’s of.
mil7.7.4:1.4_0: This is the first part of the body:
mil7.7.4:2.1_0: Furthermore, a mendicant enters an empty hut.
mil7.7.4:2.2_0: In the same way, a wise person may have the view of greed, hate, and delusion for them.
mil7.7.4:3.1_0: Furthermore, a roof-covered from all around.
mil7.7.4:3.2_0: In the same way, a person who lives alone, with bad, unskillful qualities of seclusion, one who has nothing to remain.
mil7.7.4:3.3_0: This is the third part of the body:
mil7.7.4:4.2_0: In the same way, when your neck is pure, you should be given up by continued existence, but by understanding how state of existence has been given up.
mil7.7.4:4.3_0: This is the fourth part of the body.
mil7.7.4:5.1_0: Furthermore, a noble spectrum of wisdom that should be cultivated;
mil7.7.4:5.2_0: In the same way, a cow who goes forth from the lay life to homelessness out of the noble ones should be born and produced in the noble cycle.
mil7.7.4:5.4_0: The gods have spoken by the Buddha,
mil7.7.4:6.2_0: who meditate in comfort and meditative,
mil7.7.4:6.4_0: Remember the astute by the astute.’”
mil7.7.4:7.1_0: is said to be far from wisdom.
